trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar" /> types to UI Automation.
The element associated with this automation peer.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.CalendarAutomationPeer" /> class.
An enumeration value that specifies the control pattern.
Gets the object that supports the specified control pattern of the element that is associated with this automation peer.

If <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Grid" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Table" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.MultipleView" />, or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Selection" />, this method returns a <see langword="this" /> pointer; otherwise, this method returns <see langword="null" />.
Gets the total number of columns in a grid.
The total number of columns in a grid.
trans-unit.target: Die Gesamtanzahl der Spalten in einem Raster.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Bei diesem Member handelt es sich um eine explizite Schnittstellenmember-Implementierung.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.CalendarAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Er kann nur verwendet werden, wenn die <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.CalendarAutomationPeer>-Instanz in eine <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridProvider>-Schnittstelle umgewandelt wird.

trans-unit.source: The ordinal number of the row of interest.
The ordinal number of the column of interest.
Retrieves the UI Automation provider for the specified cell.
The UI Automation provider for the specified cell.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Bei diesem Member handelt es sich um eine explizite Schnittstellenmember-Implementierung.

trans-unit.source: Gets the total number of rows in a grid.
The total number of rows in a grid.
trans-unit.target: Die Gesamtanzahl der Zeilen in einem Raster.

trans-unit.source: The item in the container after which to begin the search.
The property that contains the value to retrieve.
The value to retrieve.
Retrieves an element by the specified property value.
The first item that matches the search criterion; otherwise, <see langword="null" /> if no items match.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="viewId" /> is not a member of the supported views collection.
Gets a value that specifies whether the UI Automation provider allows more than one child element to be selected concurrently.
<see langword="true" /> if multiple selection is allowed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Wenn die Mehrfachauswahl zulässig ist andernfalls <see langword="false" />.
